query: SELECT a.lessonId, COUNT(*) as cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN a.status = 'published' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as published FROM activities a GROUP BY a.lessonId ORDER BY a.lessonId LIMIT 10
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute SELECT a.lessonId, COUNT(*) as cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN a.status = 'published' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as published FROM activities a GROUP BY a.lessonId ORDER BY a.lessonId LIMIT 10
